resources.string: Type a question..or press to ask
Based on your results, we advise that you have routine physical examinations for blood pressure, blood glucose, blood lipid, digestive system, cardiovascular system, respiratory system.\n \n

1. for the best benefits, you should perform 5 hours of moderate intensity aerobic exercise per week

 2. muscle strengthening activities that involve all major muscle groups is recommended be performed 2 or more days a week
"

1. keep low salt diet or use potassium instead of sodium

 2. add more whole grains to your diet

 3. eat less added sugar such as syrups or other sweeteners

 4. increase the variety of proteins in your diet such as seafood lean meat eggs beans nuts and so on

 5. eat less saturated fats or trans fats

 6. vegetables are good for your health, and please try to eat a variety of vegetables

 7. always eat fresh fruits
